707627f-a.text:

707628f-a.text:

707626f-a.text:
First Avenue, at the B. E. corner of East 51st Street. The upper floor of this new structure is occupied by the 12th Rssembly District, North,Aemocratic Club. The present leader of same is one,
Egan.
July 23, 1939
P. L. Sperr
